Headline: #75 74th-75thTemporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/South Shore
ShortDescription: Westbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 35th/Cottage Grove

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute near Ashland/54th
ShortDescription: #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to fire department activity near Ashland/54th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to fire department activity near Ashland/54th.

Southbound buses will operate via Ashland, 51st, Damen, 55th, and Ashland, then resume their normal route.

Northbound buses will operate via Ashland, 55th, Loomis, 51st and Ashland, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
